divs: sighting detailsi witnessed a ufo most closely resembling a star while in a car travelling north-bound on interstate 59 in trussville, al. the object was moving north at a steady pace in a straight pattern (not curving or moving up or down). it made no sound. it's light was constant (no flashing lights). i was approx. 13 years of age when this took place. i was in the car with my parents who did not see the object. i did not draw their attention to it (though i wish i had now). i noticed the object by casually looking up into the clear sky at the stars. when i first noticed the object i thought was an airplane but then realized it didn't have any flashing lights an airplane should have. it also appeared to have been moving slightly faster than a plane should. upon seeing the object i felt befuddled and have continued to feel that way about it ever since. i lost sight of the object when it flew over the horizon (this probably would put the object over the springville\ashville area at this point).
Summary: Star-like UFO witnessed on I-59 Trussville, AL
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Trussville
There were no other sightings in Trussville on or around November 30th 1992
